content.description: Start at the right side of the west face and trend diagonally up and left.
content.protection: 4 protection bolts plus anchors with rings on top
content.location: The right-most of 3 routes on the boulder. Lowering from the anchors puts you at the start for "Women Who Jerk" and "Men at Work".

climbs.name: Women Who Jerk aka The Jerk

content.description:
Listed as "The Jerk" in the guide books.

Needs some cleaning up. It's a bit dirty, with a fair amount of moss and lichen.

Tough start. Thoughtful foot placements will get you to the roof above the 1st bolt. A fun high step gets you above the roof. Climbing eases off to 10B/C after the second bolt.
content.protection: 3 protection bolts plus anchor with rings (same as for "Wet Willie")
content.location: Near the left arete of the boulder, on the left side of the tree, there are 2 routes which share the same first bolt. This is the right-most of the 2.

content.protection: 4 protection bolts plus anchors with rings on top
content.location: On the left arete. It's the left-most route on the boulder. It shares first bolt with Women Who Jerk.
